sendARequest: Send a request to reveal their identity and wait for their response!
someoneIsCurious: Someone is curious who you are!
wantToReveal: Do you want to reveal your identity to them?
whyNotStart: Why not start by saying 'Hi' or use the button below to ask something interesting, or roll for a random message!
longTimeNoSee: Long time no see! It's been a while since we last chatted. Ready to catch up?
youHaveNewMessages: You have 0 new messages! | You have 1 new message! | You have {messagesQuantity} new messages!

sampleMessages.0: Hi there! How's your day going?
sampleMessages.2: Have you read any good books lately?
sampleMessages.3: What kind of music do you listen to?
sampleMessages.4: Tell me about your dream vacation destination!
sampleMessages.5: Do you like coffee or tea?
sampleMessages.7: If you could have dinner with anyone, dead or alive, who would it be?
sampleMessages.8: What's your favorite type of movie?
sampleMessages.9: Do you prefer cats or dogs?
sampleMessages.10: What's one thing you've always wanted to try but haven't yet?
sampleMessages.11: What do you do for fun?
sampleMessages.12: How do you like to spend your weekends?
sampleMessages.14: If you could visit any country in the world, where would you go?
sampleMessages.15: What's the best concert you've ever been to?
sampleMessages.16: Do you enjoy cooking? What's your signature dish?
sampleMessages.17: Do you have a favorite quote or saying?
sampleMessages.18: What's the last movie or TV show you watched?
sampleMessages.21: What's your ideal way to relax after a long day?
sampleMessages.22: What's something you're really proud of?
sampleMessages.23: If you could live anywhere in the world, where would it be?
sampleMessages.24: What's your favorite season of the year?
sampleMessages.25: What kind of sports do you enjoy?
sampleMessages.26: Do you have any pets? Tell me about them!
sampleMessages.28: What's the most adventurous thing you've done?
sampleMessages.29: Have you ever met anyone famous?

deletingThisMessage: Deleting this message will permanently remove it if it hasn't been read by the recipient yet.
areYouSure: Are you sure you want to proceed?
revealRequestSent: Your identity request has been sent!
waitForResponse: We took 5 RushCoins. Wait for the partner's response
bothRevealed: Both of you have revealed your identities!
cannotPairAgain: You will not be able to start a conversation again.
cannotSee: This person will no longer be able to see or contact you.
cannotChat: You can no longer chat with this user.
mistakeGetSupport: If you believe this is a mistake, you can report the issue to support.
